title: Deadly Sphere Staff
info: The Deadly Sphere Staff is an aerial melee Hardmode, post-Plantera summoning weapon that summons a Deadly Sphere minion. Like other minions, the summoned Deadly Sphere is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, or cancels the buff. It attacks by charging at enemies to inflict contact damage. It cannot move through blocks. The Deadly Sphere Staff has a 2.5% / 4.94% (1/40 / 79/1600) chance to drop from Deadly Sphere during a Solar Eclipse.
